main event: Three pink objects were observed in a V formation in Amarillo, Texas on August 29, 1952.
interesting points: The objects were pink and round in shape,The sighting lasted approximately 2 seconds,The objects were possibly balloons or military aircraft,No sound was heard accompanying the departure of the objects,The observer was a captain in the USAF and the sighting was confirmed by his wife.
sighted object: three pink round objects in V formation
witness description: captain in the USAF and his wife
